title: Please don't change dianas e
body: Here's why. This will take some defensive power away from Diana and screw her ability to slow a champion down. For instance if garen uses his q to close the distance you can get him on the outer range of dianas e and use it to slow him but he also doesn't get close enough to actually hit Diana. With this change you will be inadvertently buffing any champion who tries to get in some auto attacks. Another example is hecarim. You can e to slow him down to the place where he may not being able to e you or at least it will deal less damage. For the most part if Diana gets in on a squishy target they are going to flash out anyways. This is more of an overall nerf for Diana than anything else and a situational buff.

replies.body:
I find that situations where your point is relevant are not as common as situations where the change is better.

Like how many times does Diana go near someone simply to slow them? If anything, if you don't want them on you, you shouldn't have been there to begin with. On the other hand, a stronger pull will always be more useful when jumping on someone, helping her proc her passive more easily.
You don't have to get close to use it. Only when they are running close to you. For instance tryndamere or garen chasing. I think if they do this change they need to increase the slow or slow time

It feels really lackluster id be down for them increasing the radius or increasing the vacuum. Right now it just serves as a tiny cc/ interpret rather than an actual vacuum. I think it should displace as much as Viktor upgraded w
I'd be fine if it stayed the same but I think that Diana should gain Mr and armor for each enemy champion she pulls in if they are going through with this change.

Hmm nah I don't think she should get free tank stats. Her tank build is already scary af.

How About bonus movement speed or applies moonlight to them
She's pretty strong as in, does she even need anything else on her e? Applying moonlight would be especially broken.

I actually suggested both of those ideas in a small rework idea I posted a while ago. Although if it applied moonlight in her current state she would be broken as hell. Bonus movement speed would also be a good idea but they are increasing the pull distance of her e so it would be pointless because they will be on top of her.
Yeh it's a unique spell and it really sets her apart. I don't think they'll ever change her q or her e. Maybe the other spells but those two are just too iconic and part of her identity

Honestly I think every single ability is iconic to her. They all fit her lore really good. If they took the sheild orbs away from Diana it would completely change her playstyle. The only ability they can play with is her e and even that is touchy because they can't give her more damage because then she will be op but I think her e is lackbuster and it could use a non damage aspect to it other than a vacuum with an insanly long cooldown.
